SOCIAL SERVICES

USER FRIENDLY WEBSITE

For your website to be successfull, it should not only look good but also provide a seamless user experience for visitors. This is how we set your website apart from competitors. We supply essential characterstics of a good website: Mobile Compatability, accessible to all users, well planned information architecture, we formatted content that is easy to scan, fast load times

UTSAV

We dare to bring the change in the society. So we distribute the major percentage of the money earned to Orphanages and old-age homes. As an IT company we want every child to gain education so we provide the orphans with food, study material and even Sports supplements. We provide financial help and treats to orphanages and old age homes on festivals like Diwali,Holi and so on

EDUCATION

Platform tech Solutions is not only for professionals but also for students. Students are the greatest resource of any community and as an IT company we found it as our duty to provide students especially in technical field with the best career guide. We have a lot of opportunities for students like Internships, free career guide, Tech support , trainings and even PPO (Pre Placement Offer) and anyone who already knows any technology and wants to work on Live Projects, then we also have opportunities for them. So if you are Interested to join Us, then Platform Tech Solutions Welcomes you.

WHY CHOOSE US

  • Platform Tech Solutions offers web application development assistance for business and marketing purposes.
  • Platform tech solutions offer a full range of service levels, from the small static website to the complex custom web application.
  • Programmer resources for staff-augmentation purposes are also available.
  • Platform tech solutions use the design template developed by PlatformTechCloud as the standard offering.
  • For medium- to large-size projects, we use a method of project management, which is intended to keep the client intimately involved with the direction of the project.
